channel.title: server on Monaparty Portal | Crypto asset platform based on Counterparty, Monacoin
channel.description: Recent content in server on Monaparty Portal | Crypto asset platform based on Counterparty, Monacoin

item.title: Counterparty srever is updated.
item.description: Dear Monaparty node runners, Counterpary-server for Monaparty was upgraded to 9.5812.0. This upgrade contains only an API refinement and no contract change. So it is not urgent. Please upgrade it if you have a time. fednode rebuild and fednode upgrade Note that this upgrade requires full DB reparse. So it requires an hour or more to finish your node healthy. Thank node runners a lot for supporting Monaparty.

item.title: Counterblock updated to 1.4.2+mona001
item.description: Hello Monaparty fednode server admins, Recently we upgrade our Counterblock-mona 1.4.1+mona001 to 1.4.2+mona001. This have no security fix. It doesn’t cause consensus issue. Please upgrade if you have a time by : fednode rebuild fednode update Have a happy party!

item.title: Updated Counterblock server
item.description: Dear Monaparty node runners, The counterblock server for Monaparty was bumped to 1.4.1+mona001. There have some fixes against TrueNFT related issues in this release. (No security issue but usability improvement) Please update by executing CLI. fednode rebuild counterblock fednode update counterblock fednode update counterblock-testnet
